name: Northwind
tagline: An example of Ultrastructure using ye olde thyme Northwind demonstration
body:
An Ultrastructure implementation of the venerable Northwind M$ demoware.  This is a mashup of the original order pricing demo presented in the April, 1995 issue of the Communications of the ACM.

Basically, we get a much richer model of the Northwind retail store AND add order, pricing and shipping workflows so we can actually sell things ;)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
